Who We Are
Satyam Hosting is venture of Satyam Technologies Pvt Ltd which was established in the year 2009.

As a part of Satyam Technologies we worked in the field of Custom and Commercial Application Development since 2009. We have dealt with various web hosting environments and can effortlessly resolve many of the complications that arise in day to day life as we host our customer websites.

Reasons for You to Host with us

Our Support Team is there for you 24/7
Support Team at Satyam Hosting is well managed, well trained and knowledgeable. They reply quickly to all tickets with comprehensible responses. We are available from 7 A.M IST to 7 P.M IST  i.e 24/7 round the clock.

We work Hard to meet Client Requirements
Satyam Hosting works hard to meet client needs. As your websites grow we are provide the right solutions to keep things up and running.
